about_the_game:
A whole new Journey in Nemansk awaits you! 5 Years after the Nemansk Incident you enter the Area as a young Mercenary named Dima.

Things have changed around here! Experience a whole new Story around a new Character. However, the Story of Visinov and his journey plays a huge role in Nemansk still.

Explore stunning Levels and face dangerous new environments!

Dark Skies 2 a Hobbyist Project and DK Productions' most ambitious and best Game, made with GameGuru Classic.

Dark Skies 2 is a First Person Shooter with atmospheric and dangerous environments.

The main gameplay consists of exploring various different places. Weather you find yourself in a dark underground tunnel or in a forest - you will get immersed not only because the Soundtrack for this Game has been handcrafted by the Developer himself.

Dark Skies 2 features survival elements and a simple economy system.

Players can buy weapons for gathered ressources wich makes exploring mandatory.

What can you expect?

- Single Player First Person Shooter Experience

- Unique, eerie and lonely Atmosphere

- Open Area Levels

- Dangerous Foes to Face

- Exclusive Soundtrack & Ambiance created by the Developer himself.

- A lovingly handcrafted and detailed world.

- Detailed weapons and unique hidden guns!

- Simple Economy System: Gather Level Specific Resources and trade them in for Firearms and Ammunition!

- Simplistic Hunting system: Find rare enemies and kill them for a Bonus Reward and extra Resources!

content_descriptors.notes:
Creepy Environments
Minor Bloodshed
Combat against Humans and Mutants

package_groups.title: Buy Dark Skies 2: Keepers of Nemansk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 - DirectX 11 64 BIT SYSTEMS ONLY
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD Graphics 8 GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything below the Minimal System Specs will cause issues and crashes. Dark Skies does not support LAPTOP Graphics or integrated graphic Cards like Intel HD.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 - DirectX 11 64 BIT SYSTEMS ONLY
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD Graphics 8 GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything below the Minimal System Specs will cause issues and crashes. Dark Skies does not support LAPTOP Graphics or integrated graphic Cards like Intel HD.

short_description: A whole new Journey in Nemansk awaits you! 5 Years after the Nemansk Incident you enter the Area as a young Mercenary named Dima. Experience a whole new Story set in the fictional Nemansk Region and explore dangerous new environments!
